mention.text: 306 pp. , $ 18.95 ; CHARLIE Francis , testifying in 1988 in Toronto at a federal inquiry about the use of performance-enhancing drugs in sports
Dr. Frankenstein Francis , the Canadian national sprint coach
CHARLIE Francis What did CHARLIE Francis really feel toward Johnson ; After a two-year ban , Johnson is running again
the use of performance-enhancing drugs in sports
Francis ' most famous pupil , Ben Johnson , who immigrated to Toronto from Jamaica as a scrawny 14-year-old , ran 100 meters in 9.79 seconds at the Olympics in Seoul
most famous pupil , Ben Johnson , who immigrated to Toronto from Jamaica as a scrawny 14-year-old
Millions of dollars worth of endorsements
Millions of dollars worth of endorsements
an official -LRB- but still illicit , of course -RRB- program
no longer the fastest Francis would have us believe that without steroids , Johnson
